P001.title: Getting Started with FastAPI
P001.content: FastAPI is a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs with Python 3.6+.
P001.author: Alice Johnson

P002.title: Understanding Pydantic
P002.content: Pydantic is used for data validation and settings management using Python type annotations.
P002.author: Bob Singh

P003.title: Creating CRUD APIs
P003.content: This post explains how to build Create, Read, Update, Delete APIs using FastAPI.
P003.author: Shreyas Gandhi
